mapper.select: select t.id,t. `name`, t.user_id AS userId, t.status, t.content, t.created_at AS createdAt from template t left join auth_user a on t.user_id = a.uid where t.`user_id` = #{_parameter}

select t.id,t. `name`, t.user_id AS userId, t.status, t.content, t.created_at AS createdAt from template t join auth_user a on t.user_id = pid where t.user_id= (select pid from auth_user where uid=#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR});
